extendedInfo.description: This application helps you get access to goodness of mother nature in fie clicks. Know all the natural remedies and heal your disease without using any expensive medications. Natural remedies will erode your disease from the root level. The effect will be slow but you will win the race.Tips given in this application are based on ancient uses of herbs and Ayurveda.These small tips can help you to get fresh and healthy day.OnlineHerbs is an online mail order herbal pharmacy. We aim ourselves in providing the best quality Ayurvedic medicines at affordable possible prices. We provide natural herbal remedies and natural herbal health supplements for healing various diseases. We offer holistic health in herbal way with the knowledge of Ayurveda from the ancient Vedic Culture.OnlineHerbs offer the herbal products from very well-known companies that maintain the highest standards of Ayurvedic formulation and preparations and whose products have been sold and highly praised around the world.visit www.onlineherbs.com for detailed product list.
